body:
I was trying to install maker and this is the install spec 

 spack spec --install-status maker@3.01.03%gcc@9.3.0

 version_satisfies("xproto","7.0.25:","7.0.31")
  version_satisfies("xproto","7.0.8:","7.0.29")
  version_satisfies("xproto","7.0.8:","7.0.31")
  version_satisfies("yasm","1.2.0:","1.3.0")
  version_satisfies("yasm","1.2.0:","develop")
  version_satisfies("yasm","develop","develop")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.0.4:","1.2.11")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.0.4:","1.2.3")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.0.4:","1.2.8")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.1.2:","1.2.11")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.1.2:","1.2.3")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.1.2:","1.2.8")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.1.3:","1.2.11")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.1.3:","1.2.3")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.1.3:","1.2.8")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.2.3:","1.2.11")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.2.3:","1.2.3")
  version_satisfies("zlib","1.2.3:","1.2.8")
  virtual("awk")
  virtual("blas")
  virtual("gl")
  virtual("iconv")
  virtual("java")
  virtual("jpeg")
  virtual("lapack")
  virtual("mpi")
  virtual("pil")
  virtual("pkgconfig")
  virtual("szip")
  virtual("uuid")
  virtual("yacc")
==> Error: maker@3.01.03%gcc@9.3.0 does not satisfy unknown
This errror is not informative. Let me know please.

Thanks
title: spack install error with maker install
